meanings.definition: Great enjoyment, energy, and enthusiasm in doing something.
meanings.sent1: She tackled the project with gusto, pouring all her energy into it.
meanings.sent2: The children played with gusto in the park, laughing and running around.
meanings.sent3: The puppy ate his food with such gusto that he ended up with food all over his face.
meanings.sent4: The singer performed with such gusto that the audience was captivated by her passion.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted with such gusto that the colors seemed to leap off the canvas.

meanings.sent1: He ate the delicious meal with gusto, savoring every bite.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered with gusto as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The old man danced at the party with gusto, surprising everyone with his moves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with such gusto that it was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The actor delivered his lines with such gusto that the audience was moved to tears.
